data.persona: I am a rat who has grown to a large size. I have killed cats who tried to kill me. I enjoy eating cheese that is accidentally dropped in the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Ruin of a house.
A run down wooden house buried in sand and dirt. The door is still on the house but the roof is collapsed on itself. Roots and vines cover most parts of the house.
There's a dirt, a clothes, a sand, a vine, a Root, and a tools here.
The snakes is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm staving and I want to eat every root and food scrap I can find in these ruins.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use a human's dirty clothes to wrap food to drag back to the cellar for my family to eat.
data.long_motivation: I want to stay here as long as there is food here, but eventually my family and I will have to leave.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the ruins of the house.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat food scraps while trying to avoid the snakes.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the tool room and hide behind some tools so the snakes can't find me. There are roots here.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink water from a nearby drain.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat more food scraps on my way out of the house ruins.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put food scraps on human clothes to drag back to my family. Hopefully the snakes will not try to stop me.
